thread.title: Looks Like Harry Styles' Solo Album Will Be Here Before We Know It
thread.title_full: Looks Like Harry Styles' Solo Album Will Be Here Before We Know It

author: Abigail Williams
title: Looks Like Harry Styles' Solo Album Will Be Here Before We Know It
text:
Looks Like Harry Styles' Solo Album Will Be Here Before We Know It Patience, young grasshoppers. 02/10/2017 12:32 pm ET Abigail Williams Associate Editor, News & Emerging Platforms at The Huffington Post 
Are you sitting down, Directioners? Good, because we’ve got big news: Apparently, Harry Styles will soon be blessing us with his solo album. 
For those of you who have maintained consciousness, here are the details. Columbia Records CEO Rob Stringer chatted with Billboard about Styles’ first solo venture, and he couldn’t have been more positive about the album. 
“We’re close and we’re very excited,” Stringer told Billboard. “We have a record we’re incredibly excited about and it’s not far away from being ready.” 
Stringer added that he has high hopes for Styles’ solo career. 
“We obviously want everything to be beautifully done, because we think he’s here to stay,” Stringer said. “Harry has stepped up with the vision of someone who’s authentic.” 
Stringer did not reveal an exact timeline for the album, but it sounds like Styles’ music will be here sooner rather than later. We can’t wait to dance all night to the best album ever. Also on HuffPost
